articles.title: US presidential race: Three Indian American Republican party candidates directly challenging Donald Trump | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Speculation surrounds potential Republican candidates for 2024 US presidential election. Indian-American leaders Hirsh Vardhan Singh, Nikki Haley, Vivek Ramaswamy challenge Trump's frontrunner position.
articles.content: In the lead-up to the 2024 US presidential election, speculation surrounds the potential candidates for the Republican Party's nomination. Despite facing legal challenges, former US President Donald … [+2824 chars]
